title: Project Start
description: The timeline project was initiated to visualize historical events chronologically.

title: First Milestone
description: Completed the initial design and architecture planning.

title: Development Phase
description: Started building the core functionality for event parsing and rendering.

title: Testing Stage
description: Began comprehensive testing of all timeline features.

title: Beta Release
description: Released the beta version to early users for feedback.

title: Final Launch
description: Officially launched the timeline application to the public.
